extends Entity

    • Method Detail

      • setVelocityDisappearance

        public void setVelocityDisappearance(double perDis)
        Sets the velocity of the light's fading out. NOTE: the argument is the inverse of the time it stays alight. (i.e (1/10) means 10 seconds alight)
        Parameters:
        perDis - percentage of the original radious that the lights fades for each second
